About

I'm currently a student at a/A in NYC, formally a graduate student in philosophy at Columbia, and an undergrad at NYU before that. This blog is mainly a repository for my published writing, which is mostly about politics, culture, and code. Connect below!

About this Website

Some fun facts about the setup of this website:

  • Built for Jekyll.
  • The theme is called Hyde, which is based on Poole and made by @mdo.
  • Developed on GitHub and hosted for free on GitHub Pages.
  • Coded with Atom.

Thanks for reading!
